Articles.Content:
Ive been reading threads about the 0.20 update, but im not finding any solution as to HOW to update to 0.20. When I go to the Store page to download it i dont see anything to update. Do I have to Purchase the game again to get the new version? even the update button on the Hime screen in the game isnt doing anything.

any help would be greatly appriciated!
After logging in, you'll want to click on the "profile" button. Near the bottom of that page will be the link for downloading 0.20.

I dont see an update link

I did just start my store account about an hour ago. I originally got the game from steam. Can I get the update from Steam?
All games on Steam update automaticly unless you configured them not to. So, you should get the new version from Steam. I had .20 last night even before I read it was out.
